name: LazyEditor
headline: AI Agentic Video Editor
description: LazyEditor is an AI-driven video editor that instantly handles the entire editing process, from removing silences and filler words to adding b-rolls and enhancing overall quality. We help content creators produce professional, high-quality videos that maximize engagement with minimal effort.

founders.name: Akash Gupta, Founder
founders.description: After graduating as an Engineer, I worked in trading and research at RBC Capital Markets. In my free time, I enjoy drinking coffee at SF's amazing cafes and playing Basketball and binge watching brain dead TV like Love is Blind (please don't judge :p). I love making new friends and would love to meet you over coffee or co-work.

founders.name: Nikhil Kulkarni, Founder
founders.description: Started coding in high school by making little CLI games and iOS apps. Previously worked at Snapchat as a software engineer. Love building impactful products.

generated_description:
**LazyEditor: Simplifying Video Editing with AI**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, **LazyEditor** is carving out a niche in the world of video editing. Located in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, this innovative company operates with a compact team of just three individuals.

**Mission: Empowering Creators with AI**

LazyEditor’s mission is straightforward yet powerful: to be an AI-driven video editing assistant that does the hard work for you. Gone are the days when you’d have to spend hours trimming silences, cutting filler words, or adding b-rolls to your video content. LazyEditor automates these processes to help content creators produce professional-quality videos quickly and efficiently, ultimately maximizing engagement.

**How Does It Work?**

The platform is designed for simplicity and effectiveness. Here's a snapshot of what LazyEditor offers:

- **Effortless Editing**: Just upload your raw clips, and LazyEditor takes care of stitching them together, allowing you to focus on content.
- **Smart Captions**: Proven caption styles are added automatically to enhance accessibility and viewer engagement.
- **Curated B-Rolls**: It intelligently fetches relevant visuals and infographics to back up your video's message.
- **Copyright-Free Music**: The AI automatically selects the right background music to set the mood.
- **Transcript Editing**: You can edit your video timeline as easily as editing text, making it intuitive for anyone.
- **Community Engagement**: Share your work in a dedicated Discord channel to gather feedback and tips from fellow creators.

**Target Audience**

LazyEditor is particularly helpful for content creators engaging in short-form video, like TikTok or YouTube Shorts. Testimonials highlight how users have saved significant editing hours, allowing them to produce more content in less time—a game-changer for busy creators.

**Community and Support**

Beyond the technology, LazyEditor is fostering a community where users can exchange ideas and strategies, seeking to help them grow their audiences significantly. 

If you’re tired of spending endless hours editing your videos and are looking for a smoother, more efficient process, head over to [LazyEditor](https://www.lazyeditor.ai/) and experience the benefits of AI-powered video editing for yourself. 

In an era where content is king, LazyEditor is positioning itself to be a vital tool for creators, saving time and enhancing productivity. So, if you’re a passionate creator ready to ramp up your video production without the headache of traditional editing, LazyEditor just might be your new best friend.
